name: FlashBall
description:
This is my first game proyect.  Flashball is my attempt to make a good, yet minimalistic design with games, the gameplay mechanic is simple: you aim like a slingshot, then you shoot to the desired location, during the aim, the time goes slower,  and you need to go from point A to point B, just that.

After Flashball, I'm looking forward to participate in a game jam, if you are interested in colaborating  with me and/or discussing about the game, you can do it joining to my Discord server: https://discord.gg/FXgHjXT
